content:
SizeToContent Enum

Definition

Specifies how a window will automatically size itself to fit the size of its content. Used by the stem.Windows.Window.SizeToContent* property.

In this Article

[ECMA2Yaml.Models.ECMAAttribute]
public enum SizeToContent
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
Enum
SizeToContent
Attributes
LocalizabilityAttribute

Fields

Height

Specifies that a window will automatically set its height to fit the height of its content, but not the width.
Manual

Specifies that a window will not automatically set its size to fit the size of its content. Instead, the size of a window is determined by other properties, including stem.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width*, stem.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height*, stem.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxWidth*, stem.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxHeight*, stem.Windows.FrameworkElement.MinWidth*, and stem.Windows.FrameworkElement.MinHeight*. See WPF Windows Overview.
Width

Specifies that a window will automatically set its width to fit the width of its content, but not the height.
WidthAndHeight

Specifies that a window will automatically set both its width and height to fit the width and height of its content.
